## Observable.(constructor)

Creates a new observable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(onObserverAdded?: (observer: Observer<T>) => void);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  onObserverAdded | <code>(observer: Observer&lt;T&gt;) =&gt; void</code> | defines a callback to call when a new observer is added |
